name: node-config-loader
description: Scan directories and loads json and yaml files

scripts.prepublish: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.pull: git checkout master && git pull origin master
scripts.push: git push origin master --tags && npm publish
scripts.release-patch: npm run pull && npm version patch && npm run push
scripts.release-minor: npm run pull && npm version minor && npm run push
scripts.release-major: npm run pull && npm version major && npm run push
scripts.clean: rm -rf *.map loadConfig.js webpack.js index.js common filters parsers utils __tests__
scripts.test.cov: babel-node node_modules/.bin/babel-istanbul cover --report text --report html node_modules/.bin/_mocha

author: Stefan Zerkalica <zerkalica@gmail.com>
